subject: Add missing tones and rename sarcastic tone
body:
Added 3 crucial tones that were missing from the tone system:
- shy (Feeling) - for timid/self-conscious messages
- embarrassed (Feeling) - for feeling exposed after mistakes
- joking (Attitude) - clarifies "this is meant to be funny"

Renamed sarcastic to "(not) sarcastic" for meta-sarcastic effect.

Updated documentation:
- constants/tones.ts: Added new tones with appropriate colors
- CLAUDE.md: Fixed tone counts (35â†’37) and corrected Feeling category (removed "excited" which was incorrectly listed)
- README.md: Updated tone counts and lists to match

New totals: 17 Feeling, 12 Attitude, 8 Energy = 37 total tones
title: Add missing tones and rename sarcastic tone
